short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You will be able to change the base fonts, style, size, color and many other options during this process

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Creating a tikTok font is an excellent idea for anyone who wants to use the platform for fun or practical purposes. It's easy and inexpensive to do without requiring any technical know-how or apps! Simply follow these steps and start creating your own unique tikTok fonts today!

Features:
☆ Make all text bigger or smaller
☆ Creating your own Unique
☆ Change Random style font

Quick start: click the icon in the toolbar to open a popup.
